name: Leona
title: the Radiant Dawn
shortBio: Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a holy warrior of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and the Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire while her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her. Armored in gold and bearing a terrible burden of ancient knowledge, Leona brings enlightenment to some, death to others.

skins.name: Valkyrie Leona
skins.description: Hail the valkyrie, for she will descend upon the field of battle, and raise our greatest warriors into the halls of Valhalla! Those she doesn't take with her go to the underworld, or sometimes the ocean, though they don't tell you that before the whole 'dying in battle' thing.

skins.name: Iron Solari Leona
skins.description: She who bears the Iron Solari into battle bears the weight of history—as iron gives way to steel, and steel to eternity.

skins.name: Pool Party Leona
skins.description: Leona is a former champion surfer, who enjoys spending her downtime relaxing on the beach with a light romance novel. Or pretty much any romance novel, in fact.

skins.name: PROJECT: Leona
skins.description: A heavy armor combatant, Leona has seen the truth behind the neon light of PROJECT, and now stands with Ashe and the G/NETIC rebellion. She carries a mounted ion charge shield, capable of blocking and stunning targets with its variable energy yield output.

skins.name: Barbecue Leona
skins.description: She's the solar pitmaster; the lean, mean, brisket queen. If her flavors don't stun you, that forty pound grill will. Please give a warm welcome to Leona!

skins.name: Solar Eclipse Leona
skins.description: Hearken! We beseech thee, O Cruel Sun, and deign to bless with the cleansing flame of thy celestial majesty. May this shield guard against the scourge of dark enchantments, which choke our land. May this blade be the hammer against the servants of witchery and evil. I, Leona, do take this oath forevermore.

skins.name: Lunar Eclipse Leona
skins.description: Hearken! We beseech thee, O Savage Moon, and deign to bless with the vermillion shadow of thy celestial majesty. May this shield guard against the scourge of dark enchantments, which choke our land. May this blade be the hammer against the servants of witchery and evil. I, Leona, do take this oath forevermore.

skins.name: Mecha Kingdoms Leona

chromas.name: Mecha Kingdoms Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Mecha Kingdoms Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Leona grew up as the favored daughter of the Dawnrise Kingdom. When the leviathans appeared on her homeland's shores, she took command of her realm's forces, becoming the matriarch of her people. In return, the grateful scholars of her court gifted her an Avalon, an immense pilotable mech powered by the life essence of the very monsters that threatened her home. Now, she stands fearless, leading vast navies into war.

skins.name: Battle Academia Leona

chromas.name: Battle Academia Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: An oddly cheery member of Labrys Academy's Battle Club, Leona's dark side comes out in combat, when her motherly, protective persona is utterly replaced by bloodlust. The change is so dramatic that even the most violent students tend to stay on her good side, hoping to avoid her wrath.

skins.name: DWG Leona

chromas.name: DWG Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during MSI 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during MSI 2021.

skins.description: Honoring BeryL's winning performance as Leona during the 2020 World Championship.

skins.name: Prestige Battle Academia Leona
skins.description: After being selected for the yearly cross-academy tournament, Leona sharpened her combat prowess almost every free moment she had, knowing she had to beat out other top-ranking students from rival schools like Durandal, Babylon, Amrita, and Sharur. Her bloodlust now honed and her shield at the ready, she will pummel anyone who challenges her into a meaty pulp.

skins.name: Debonair Leona

chromas.name: Debonair Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Debonair Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Debonair event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Debonair event.

skins.description: An enforcer at the exclusive Solari resort, Leona spends her days brutally ejecting unruly patrons from the premises and her evenings schmoozing up the city's ultra-wealthy. Even the rich and powerful know not to trifle with the Solari's chosen, lest they find themselves soaring out of the penthouse suite and down into the sidewalk.

skins.name: High Noon Leona

chromas.name: High Noon Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: High Noon Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

skins.description: The Lady of House Solari lifts her chin against the scorching wind. Ahead lies her family's salvation: the Sulfur Rail, carrying the stolen family fortune, churning across the desert. The only thing that stands in her way is the Mechanical Devil himself. Her sword hums like cicadas in the gloaming. The butterflies gather. Time for the Harbingers to ride.

skins.name: Crystalis Motus Leona
skins.description: Leona knows what caused the purge: blasphemy. Magic's disappearance was retribution for humanity's arrogance and misuse of it. As a worshipper of the Prismae Crystals, she believes it's her sacred duty to protect them. But she also prays to them in secret, hoping they'll bring back her lost love, Diana, who disappeared after journeying to the north.

skins.name: Battle Lion Leona

chromas.name: Battle Lion Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: Battle Lion Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

chromas.name: Battle Lion Leona

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

skins.description: Leona is Anima Squad's reliable front-line defense, big sister, and official wrangler of its wilder members. Someone has to make sure those fire starters from the demolitions team get safely back to base! Don't think Leona can't bring the pain on her own, though. When it comes to battle, you will hear her roar!

skins.name: Prestige Battle Lion Leona
skins.description: Sporting the latest in fashionable activewear for any on-the-go warrior, Leona defends her title of “Pride of the Runway” as easily as she rocks a bold lip color. Saving the world is important, but doing it with style? That's what Anima Squad is all about.

passive.name: Sunlight
passive.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

spells.name: Shield of Daybreak
spells.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
spells.dynamicDescription: Leona's next Attack <status>Stuns</status> for @Effect1Amount@ seconds and deals an additional <magicDamage>@TotalDamageTooltip@</magicDamage> magic damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Eclipse
spells.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Leona raises her shield, reducing incoming damage by @FlatDamageReduction@ and gaining @BonusArmorTooltip@ Armor and @BonusMRTooltip@ Magic Resist for @Effect3Amount@ seconds. Afterwards, her shield detonates, dealing @TotalDamageTooltip@ magic damage to nearby enemies. If she hits at least one, she retains the Armor and Magic Resist bonuses for an additional @Effect3Amount@ seconds.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Zenith Blade
spells.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Leona thrusts with a sword of light, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamageTooltip@ magic damage</magicDamage>. The last champion struck will be <status>Rooted</status> for @Effect2Amount@ seconds and Leona will dash to them.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Solar Flare
spells.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
spells.dynamicDescription: Leona calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing <magicDamage>@ExplosionCalculatedDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by @SlowPercent@% for @CCDuration@ seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are <status>Stunned</status> instead of <status>Slowed</status>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
